sections.title: Verse 1
content: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation!
O my soul, praise Him, for He is thy health and salvation!
All ye who hear, now to His temple draw near;

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Praise to the Lord, Who oâ€™er all things so wondrously reigneth,
Sheltering thee under His wings, yea, so gently sustaineth!
Hast thou not seen how thy enemies flee,
When thou dost trust in His mercy?

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Praise to the Lord, who will prosper thy work and defend thee;
Surely His goodness and mercy shall daily attend thee.
Out of deep anguish and peril, O praise Him!
All ye who know His salvation.
